title: libcudnn.so: file not recognized: File truncated
body_html:
On installing from source (CUDA 8.0, CuDNN 5.1, Ubuntu 16.04, with MAGMA and all dependencies installed)

I get the following error on python setup.py install

/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so: file not recognized: File truncated

Note: cuda is a symlink to cuda-8.0 and lib64 is also a symlink to targets/x86_64-linux/lib.
body_text:
On installing from source (CUDA 8.0, CuDNN 5.1, Ubuntu 16.04, with MAGMA and all dependencies installed)
I get the following error on python setup.py install
/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so: file not recognized: File truncated

Note: cuda is a symlink to cuda-8.0 and lib64 is also a symlink to targets/x86_64-linux/lib.
body:
On installing from source (CUDA 8.0, CuDNN 5.1, Ubuntu 16.04, with MAGMA and all dependencies installed)

I get the following error on `python setup.py install`
```
/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so: file not recognized: File truncated
```
Note: `cuda` is a symlink to `cuda-8.0` and `lib64` is also a symlink to `targets/x86_64-linux/lib`.
